message:

story: Omar Negm shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: go.microsoft.com
caption: download.microsoft.com

data.message:
Useful Tip: If you have get the online Visual Studio updater, you can run it with the /layout argument from CMD and it will let you download all the update files into a folder you choose, basically making an offline installer for you.
However this will download more than if you just run it normally, since you'll be downloading all the localizations and pieces that you don't actually need but other might need.
